CustomField.description: The number of years in which we will increase the price on a yearly basis. Works with the Price Increase Percent and Year 2+ Price Increase Percent fields to determine how long we should increase the price for a product. A value of 0 means there's not limit to the number of years we will increase the price, a value of 1 means we will increase on the first renewal year, 2 would be the second, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of years in which we will increase the price on a yearly basis.
CustomField.label: # of Years for Price Increase
